item.title: Couple duped of gold necklace by imposters in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A couple was duped by two imposters who then made away with a 28-gram gold necklace in Raichur district on Sunday.
In his complaint filed with Yaragera Police, the complainant Mallesh has said that when he along with his wife was going on his motorcycle to attend a religious programme, the two imposters intercepted them near Nallabanda Cross saying that they were policemen.
They told him that it was not safe to travel on the route wearing gold ornaments and asked them to remove it and pack it ...]]>
item.author: Authors
